title: How Trump pulled off an incredible comeback
content: Millions of Americans voted to give him a second chance - our North America editor Sarah Smith looks at why.
summary: Millions of Americans voted to give him a second chance - our North America editor Sarah Smith looks at why.

title: Netanyahu and Starmer lead congratulations to Trump
content: Hungary's prime minister hails a "much-needed victory for the world", and France's president said it would work with him "with respect and ambition".

title: What Trump's win means for Ukraine, Middle East and China
content: Trump's promises on China as well as ending wars in Ukraine and the Middle East will soon be put to the test.

title: Ukraine says it fought N Korean troops for first time
content: Defence Minister Rustem Umerov said a "small group" of North Korean soldiers were attacked.

title: Six states expand abortion protections as Florida ballot fails
content: The ballot initiative in Florida would have allowed abortion until the point of foetal viability or about 24 weeks.

title: Republicans projected to retake control of US Senate
content: Republican Bernie Moreno takes Ohio seat from veteran Sherrod Brown, ending the Democrat majority.

title: Dollar and Bitcoin soar as Trump wins presidency

title: China welcomes Myanmar's embattled leader on first visit since coup
content: It's not a state visit, but Beijing's invitation to Min Aung Hlaing is still significant.

title: Killers of Ugandan Olympian sentenced to 35 years

title: Algeria silent after civil war book wins top French award

title: Slapping MP shows generational change may not end abuse of power in Nigeria
